root.name: Winning Post World 2010
root.description: OverviewWinning Post World 2010 (ウイニングポストワールド 2010) is the fifteenth game in the Winning Post series and the second game in the Winning Post World sub-series. Developed and published by Koei, Winning Post World 2010 was released in Japan for the Playstation 2, Playstation 3, PC, Xbox 360, and Wii.
